metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11082 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Kaminari before 1.2.1, there is a vulnerability that would allow an attacker to inject arbitrary code into pages with pagination links. This has been fixed in 1.2.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11082` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-kaminari - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-actionview - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-activerecord - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-core - 1.0.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-kaminari package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-6').
